p: The few superemitters of city sectors represent a disproportionately large fraction of the total emissions. The top 2.5% of the 7098 industrial city sectors in perâ€“industrial output emissions contribute 70% of total CO 2 emissions ( Fig. 4A, emission-Lorenz curve). Figure 4 (B and C) shows the top 10 and bottom 10 industrial city sectors, respectively, in terms of emissions per industrial output.
